name: ListConversationsMetadata
description:
List metadata for Slack conversations (channels and/or direct messages) that the user
is a member of.

parameters.name: conversation_types
parameters.description: The type(s) of conversations to list. Defaults to all types.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of conversations to list.

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination.

output.description: The conversations metadata list and a pagination 'next_cursor', if there are more conversations to retrieve.
